meanings.definition: The state of being without children.
meanings.sent1: Her childlessness brought her both sadness and freedom.
meanings.sent2: The couple's childlessness was a personal choice.
meanings.sent3: Despite her childlessness, she was the favorite aunt to all her nieces and nephews.
meanings.sent4: The garden, with its childlessness of flowers, seemed barren yet peaceful.
meanings.sent5: The childlessness of the playground echoed with the laughter of others' children.

meanings.definition: The condition of not having any offspring.
meanings.sent1: Their childlessness was a topic of discussion among family members.
meanings.sent2: The elderly couple accepted their childlessness with grace.
meanings.sent3: The cat's childlessness was a relief for the neighbors who didn't want more kittens around.
meanings.sent4: The tree's childlessness was a stark contrast to the fruit-laden branches nearby.
meanings.sent5: The childlessness of the zoo's panda exhibit was a disappointment for visitors hoping to see cubs.
